transitions.condition: frappe.db.get_value('Department', doc.department, 'head_of_department') == frappe.db.get_value('Employee', {'user_id': frappe.session.user}, 'name') and doc.request_for == 'Employee Replacement'

transitions.action: Send to CEO for Initial Approval
transitions.condition: frappe.db.get_value('Department', doc.department, 'head_of_department') == frappe.db.get_value('Employee', {'user_id': frappe.session.user}, 'name') and doc.request_for == 'New Vacancy'

transitions.action: Send to CEO for Final Approval
